COMMON.TAG_LINE: Your agile, free, and open source project management tool
COMMON.BLOCKED_NOTE: Why is this user story blocked?
COMMON.GENERIC_ERROR: One of our Oompa Loompas says {{error}}.
COMMON.IOCAINE_TEXT: Feeling a bit overwhelmed by a task? Make sure others know about it by clicking on Iocaine when editing a task. It's possible to become immune to this (fictional) deadly poison by consuming small amounts over time just as it's possible to get better at what you do by occasionally taking on extra challenges!

FORM_ERRORS.DEFAULT_MESSAGE: This value seems to be invalid.
FORM_ERRORS.TYPE_EMAIL: This value should be a valid email.
FORM_ERRORS.TYPE_URL: This value should be a valid url.
FORM_ERRORS.TYPE_URLSTRICT: This value should be a valid url.
FORM_ERRORS.TYPE_NUMBER: This value should be a valid number.
FORM_ERRORS.TYPE_DATEISO: This value should be a valid date (YYYY-MM-DD).
FORM_ERRORS.TYPE_PHONE: This value should be a valid phone number.
FORM_ERRORS.NOTNULL: This value should not be null.
FORM_ERRORS.NOT_BLANK: This value should not be blank.
FORM_ERRORS.REGEXP: This value seems to be invalid.
FORM_ERRORS.MIN: This value should be greater than or equal to %s.
FORM_ERRORS.MAX: This value should be lower than or equal to %s.
FORM_ERRORS.RANGE: This value should be between %s and %s.
FORM_ERRORS.MIN_LENGTH: This value is too short. It should have %s characters or more.
FORM_ERRORS.MAX_LENGTH: This value is too long. It should have %s characters or less.
FORM_ERRORS.RANGE_LENGTH: This value length is invalid. It should be between %s and %s characters long.
FORM_ERRORS.MIN_CHECK: You must select at least %s choices.
FORM_ERRORS.MAX_CHECK: You must select %s choices or less.
FORM_ERRORS.RANGE_CHECK: You must select between %s and %s choices.
FORM_ERRORS.EQUAL_TO: This value should be the same.

DESCRIPTION.EMPTY: Empty space is so boring... go on be descriptive...

ASSIGNED_TO.CONFIRM_UNASSIGNED: Are you sure you want to leave it unassigned?

CUSTOM_ATTRIBUTES.CONFIRM_DELETE: Remeber that all values in this custom field will be deleted.</br> Are you sure you want to continue?

WYSIWYG.PICTURE_SAMPLE_TEXT: Your alternative text to picture here...

AUTH.INVITED_YOU: has invited you to join the project

HOME.EMPTY_WATCHING: Follow the projects, User Stories, Tasks, Issues... that you want to know about :)

ATTACHMENT.TITLE: {{ fileName }} uploaded on {{ date }}
ATTACHMENT.ERROR_UPLOAD_ATTACHMENT: We have not been able to upload '{{fileName}}'. {{errorMessage}}
ATTACHMENT.ERROR_DELETE_ATTACHMENT: We have not been able to delete: {{errorMessage}}

ADMIN.HELP: Do you need help? Check out our support page!

PROJECT_DEFAULT_VALUES.TITLE: Default Values
PROJECT_DEFAULT_VALUES.SUBTITLE: Set default values for all selector inputs.

PROJECT_EXPORT.TITLE: Export
PROJECT_EXPORT.SUBTITLE: Export your project to save a backup or to create a new one based on this.
PROJECT_EXPORT.LOADING_TITLE: We are generating your dump file
PROJECT_EXPORT.ASYNC_MESSAGE: We will send you an email when ready.
PROJECT_EXPORT.SYNC_MESSAGE: If the download doesn't start automatically click here.
PROJECT_EXPORT.ERROR: Our Oompa Loompas have some problems generating your dump. Please try it again.
PROJECT_EXPORT.ERROR_BUSY: Sorry, our Oompa Loompas are very busy right now. Please try again in a few minutes.
PROJECT_EXPORT.ERROR_MESSAGE: Our Oompa Loompas have some problems generating your dump: {{message}}

MODULES.TITLE: Modules
MODULES.BACKLOG_DESCRIPTION: Manage your user stories to maintain an organized view of upcoming and prioritized work.
MODULES.KANBAN_DESCRIPTION: Organize your project in a lean way with this board.
MODULES.ISSUES_DESCRIPTION: Track the bugs, questions and enhancements related to your project. Don't miss anything!
MODULES.WIKI_DESCRIPTION: Add, modify, or delete content in collaboration with others. This is the right place for your project documentation.
MODULES.MEETUP_DESCRIPTION: Choose your videoconference system. Even developers need face to face contact.
MODULES.SALT_CHAT_ROOM: If you want you can append a salt code to the name of the chat room

REPORTS.TITLE: Reports
REPORTS.SUBTITLE: Export your project data in CSV format and make your own reports.
REPORTS.DESCRIPTION: Download a CSV file or copy the generated URL and open it in your favourite text editor or spreadsheet to make your own project data reports. You will be able to visualize and analize all your data easily.
REPORTS.HELP: How to use this on my own spreadsheet?
REPORTS.REGENERATE_SUBTITLE: You going to change the CSV data access url. The previous url will be disabled. Are you sure?

CUSTOM_FIELDS.TITLE: Custom Fields
CUSTOM_FIELDS.SUBTITLE: Specify the custom fields for your user stories, tasks and issues
CUSTOM_FIELDS.US_ADD: Add a custom field in user stories
CUSTOM_FIELDS.TASK_ADD: Add a custom field in tasks
CUSTOM_FIELDS.ISSUE_ADD: Add a custom field in issues

PROJECT_VALUES.REPLACEMENT: All items with this value will be changed to

PROJECT_VALUES_POINTS.TITLE: Us points
PROJECT_VALUES_POINTS.SUBTITLE: Specify the points your user stories could be estimated to

PROJECT_VALUES_PRIORITIES.TITLE: Issue priorities
PROJECT_VALUES_PRIORITIES.SUBTITLE: Specify the priorities your issues will have

PROJECT_VALUES_SEVERITIES.TITLE: Issue severities
PROJECT_VALUES_SEVERITIES.SUBTITLE: Specify the severities your issues will have

PROJECT_VALUES_STATUS.TITLE: Status
PROJECT_VALUES_STATUS.SUBTITLE: Specify the statuses your user stories, tasks and issues will go through

PROJECT_VALUES_TYPES.TITLE: Types
PROJECT_VALUES_TYPES.SUBTITLE: Specify the types your issues could be

ROLES.WARNING_NO_ROLE: Be careful, no role in your project will be able to estimate the point value for user stories
ROLES.HELP_ROLE_ENABLED: When enabled, members assigned to this role will be able to estimate the point value for user stories
ROLES.REPLACEMENT_ROLE: All the users with this role will be moved to
ROLES.WARNING_DELETE_ROLE: Be careful, all role estimations will be removed

BITBUCKET.INFO_VERIFYING_IP: Bitbucket requests are not signed so the best way of verifying the origin is by IP. If the field is empty there will be no IP validation.

GITLAB.INFO_VERIFYING_IP: Gitlab requests are not signed so the best way of verifying the origin is by IP. If the field is empty there will be no IP validation.

WEBHOOKS.SUBTITLE: Webhooks notify external services about events in Taiga, like comments, user stories....

MEMBERSHIP.SUCCESS_SEND_INVITATION: We've sent the invitation again to '{{email}}'.
MEMBERSHIP.ERROR_DELETE: We have not been able to delete {{message}}.

DEFAULT_VALUES.LABEL_US: Default value for US status selector
DEFAULT_VALUES.LABEL_TASK_STATUS: Default value for task status selector
DEFAULT_VALUES.LABEL_ISSUE_TYPE: Default value for issue type selector
DEFAULT_VALUES.LABEL_ISSUE_STATUS: Default value for issue status selector

STATUS.PLACEHOLDER_WRITE_STATUS_NAME: Write a name for the new status

TYPES.PLACEHOLDER_WRITE_NAME: Write a name for the new element

US_STATUS.PLACEHOLDER_WRITE_NAME: Write a name for the new status

PROFILE.CURRENT_USER_CONTACTS_EMPTY_EXPLAIN: The people with whom you work at Taiga will be your contacts automatically

PROFILE_SIDEBAR.TITLE: Your profile
PROFILE_SIDEBAR.DESCRIPTION: Lots of people could see what do you do and what are you working on. Add tags so you will give an enhanced version of your information.

PROJECT.HELP:
Reorder your projects to set in the top the most used ones.
The top 10 projects will appear in the top navigation bar project list

IMPORT.TITLE: Importing Project
IMPORT.DESCRIPTION: This process can take a while, please keep the window open.
IMPORT.ASYNC_IN_PROGRESS_TITLE: Our Oompa Loompas are importing your project
IMPORT.ASYNC_IN_PROGRESS_MESSAGE:
This process could take a few minutes
We will send you an email when ready
IMPORT.ERROR: Our Oompa Loompas have some problems importing your dump data. Please try again.
IMPORT.ERROR_TOO_MANY_REQUEST: Sorry, our Oompa Loompas are very busy right now. Please try again in a few minutes.
IMPORT.ERROR_MESSAGE: Our Oompa Loompas have some problems importing your dump data: {{error_message}}
IMPORT.ERROR_MAX_SIZE_EXCEEDED: '{{fileName}}' ({{fileSize}}) is too heavy for our Oompa Loompas, try it with a smaller than ({{maxFileSize}})
IMPORT.SYNC_SUCCESS: Your project has been imported successfuly

DELETE_ACCOUNT.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete your Taiga account?
DELETE_ACCOUNT.SUBTITLE: We're going to miss you! :-(
DELETE_ACCOUNT.NEWSLETTER_LABEL_TEXT: I don't wanna receive your newsletter anymore

DELETE_PROJECT.TITLE: Delete project
DELETE_PROJECT.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
DELETE_PROJECT.SUBTITLE: All project data (user stories, tasks, issues, sprints and wiki pages) will be lost! :-(

ADD_MEMBER.TITLE: New Member
ADD_MEMBER.HELP_TEXT: If users are already registered on Taiga, they will be added automatically. Otherwise they will receive an invitation.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: Tell us something...
FEEDBACK.COMMENT: ...a bug, some suggestions, something cool... or even your worst nightmare with Taiga

ADD_EDIT_SPRINT.TITLE: New sprint
ADD_EDIT_SPRINT.ACTION_DELETE_SPRINT: Do you want to delete this sprint?

CREATE_EDIT_US.PLACEHOLDER_DESCRIPTION: Please add descriptive text to help others better understand this US

CREATE_MEMBER.PLACEHOLDER_INVITATION_TEXT: (Optional) Add a personalized text to the invitation. Tell something lovely to your new members ;-)

US.ADD_BULK: Add some new User Stories in bulk
US.PROMOTED: This US has been promoted from Issue:
US.EXTERNAL_REFERENCE: This US has been created from

ACTIVITY.SIZE_CHANGE: Made {size, plural, one{one change} other{# changes}}

CHART.REAL: Real pending points for sprint {{xval}} is {{yval}}

CHART.INCREMENT_CLIENT: Incremented points by client requirements for sprint {{xval}} is {{yval}}

ERROR.TEXT1: Something happened and our Oompa Loompas are working on it.
ERROR.NOT_FOUND_TEXT: Error 404. The page you are looking for no longer exists. Perhaps you can return back to TAIGA homepage and see if you can find what you are looking for.
ERROR.VERSION_ERROR: Someone inside Taiga has changed this before and our Oompa Loompas cannot apply your changes. Please reload and apply your changes again (they will be lost).

TASKBOARD.TITLE_ACTION_ADD_BULK: Add some new Tasks in bulk

CHARTS.OPTIMAL: Optimal pending points for day {{formattedDate}} should be {{roundedValue}}
CHARTS.REAL: Real pending points for day {{formattedDate}} is {{roundedValue}}

TASK.ORIGIN_US: This task has been created from
TASK.TITLE_ACTION_IOCAINE: Feeling a bit overwhelmed by a task? Make sure others know about it by clicking on Iocaine when editing a task. It's possible to become immune to this (fictional) deadly poison by consuming small amounts over time just as it's possible to get better at what you do by occasionally taking on extra challenges!

NOTIFICATION.WARNING_TEXT: Our Oompa Loompas are sad, your changes were not saved!
NOTIFICATION.SAVED: Our Oompa Loompas saved all your changes!

CANCEL_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Cancel your account
CANCEL_ACCOUNT.SUBTITLE: We're sorry you are leaving the taiga, we hope you enjoyed your stay :)
CANCEL_ACCOUNT.SUCCESS: Our Oompa Loompas removed your account

CHANGE_EMAIL_FORM.TITLE: Change your email
CHANGE_EMAIL_FORM.SUBTITLE: One click more and your email will be updated!
CHANGE_EMAIL_FORM.SUCCESS: Our Oompa Loompas updated your email

CHANGE_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_FORM.TITLE: Create a new Taiga pass
CHANGE_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_FORM.SUBTITLE: And hey, you may want to eat some more iron-rich food, it's good for your brain :P
CHANGE_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_FORM.TITLE_LINK_NEED_TOKEN: Did you need a token to recover your password because you forgot it?
CHANGE_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_FORM.SUCCESS:
Our Oompa Loompas saved your new password.
Try to sign in with it.

FORGOT_PASSWORD_FORM.TITLE: Oops, did you forget your password?
FORGOT_PASSWORD_FORM.SUBTITLE: Enter your username or email to get a new one
FORGOT_PASSWORD_FORM.LINK_CANCEL: Nah, take me back. I think I remember it.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_FORM.SUCCESS:
Check your inbox!
We have sent you an email with the instructions to set a new password
FORGOT_PASSWORD_FORM.ERROR: According to our Oompa Loompas, your are not registered yet.

LOGIN_FORM.ERROR_GENERIC: According to our Oompa Loompas there was an error.
LOGIN_FORM.SUCCESS: Our Oompa Loompas are happy, welcome to Taiga.

TIMELINE.UPLOAD_ATTACHMENT: {{username}} has uploaded a new attachment in {{obj_name}}
TIMELINE.US_CREATED: {{username}} has created a new US in {{project_name}} {{obj_name}}
TIMELINE.ISSUE_CREATED: {{username}} has created a new Issue in {{project_name}} {{obj_name}}
TIMELINE.TASK_CREATED: {{username}} has created a new Task in {{project_name}} {{obj_name}}
TIMELINE.WIKI_CREATED: {{username}} has created a new Wiki page in {{project_name}} {{obj_name}}
TIMELINE.MILESTONE_CREATED: {{username}} has created a new Milestone in {{project_name}} {{obj_name}}
TIMELINE.US_UPDATED: {{username}} has updated the attribute "{{field_name}}" of the US {{obj_name}}
TIMELINE.ISSUE_UPDATED: {{username}} has updated the attribute "{{field_name}}" of the Issue {{obj_name}}
TIMELINE.TASK_UPDATED: {{username}} has updated the attribute "{{field_name}}" of the Task {{obj_name}}
TIMELINE.TASK_UPDATED_WITH_US: {{username}} has updated the attribute "{{field_name}}" of the Task {{obj_name}} which belongs to the US {{us_name}}
TIMELINE.US_REMOVED_FROM_MILESTONE: {{username}} has added the US {{obj_name}} to the Backlog
